channel.title: CNN on Mateusz Baryła
channel.description: Recent content in CNN on Mateusz Baryła

item.title: What is this fruit? Deep learning application for Vietnamese fruit recognition.
item.author: mateusz.baryla.1996@gmail.com (Mateusz Baryła)
item.description: In April 2018 I deployed first deep learning application to production. This app was a group project during the subject called Introduction to Artificial Intelligence conducted in Asia, at Ton Duc Thang University in Vietnam. I was one of first two students that represented Wrocław University of Science and Technology in Asia. It was a great opportunity to learn how to relate with other people in international environment. I also deepened my understanding of AI building from scratch web application in python, HTML and CSS.
